title: Shah Legal Sh-Update + Gail Simmons from Top Chef!
itunes:title: Shah Legal Sh-Update + Gail Simmons from Top Chef!

description:
Happy holiday weekend! Danny welcomes attorney Bryant Greening to Everything Iconic to talk about the Shah legal case that has taken The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City fans by storm, what's to come, and what it all means. Then he chats with Top Chef judge/icon Gail Simmons about the new season, what happened to the Just Desserts spinoff, and more!


Gail Interview: 9:09ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
